title: Colored Summary Statistics — color_summary
code: color_summary(rnorm(100)) #> Summary Statistics:  #> Mean:    0.07  #> Median:  0.09  #> SD:      1.05  #> Min:     -2.61  #> Max:     2.76  #> Q25:     -0.36  #> Q75:     0.62  color_summary(runif(50), digits=4) #> Summary Statistics:  #> Mean:    0.5391  #> Median:  0.6002  #> SD:      0.3047  #> Min:     0.017  #> Max:     0.9835  #> Q25:     0.2558  #> Q75:     0.7765
